title: Name change during preseason messed with my rewards?
body: So I just wanted some clarification but I recently changed my name in League and I saw that my friends received their icons for ranked, however I had not received mine. I was just wondering if this would be fixed for the people that changed their name and they would receive the rewards later or however. Just wanted to know or if I needed to contact Riot. Thanks for reading.

replies.body: It looks like you didn't receive any ranked rewards due to having been disqualified from them. This account recently had a 2 week ban on 9/23, when the [**Ranked Rewards Help Desk**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/W0aEONuP-2017-ranked-rewards-help-desk) mentions any ban lasting longer than 7 days after 8/22 disqualifies you.

If you don't receive your rewards for Season 7 by the end of November, contact [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and they can assist you. Name changes should be the cause of you not receiving your rewards yet.
